configuration.name: ALLOW_LIST
configuration.label: E-mail domain allow list
configuration.description: The e-mail domain allow list gives you the ability to create a list of e-mail burner domains allowed to register an account for your applications. This field allows you to specify multiple e-mail domains, by comma-separating them.
